title: Delivery
summary: Delivery, a package tracking app for Android Wear.
description: Delivery helps you keep track of your packages on your Android Wear watch. Delivery currently supports: UPS, FedEx, USPS, and DHL. If you know any free tracking API, please let me know. Thanks!CREDIT: Thank Boxoh for providing the new package tracking API: http://www.boxoh.com/api/docs/
descriptionHTML:
Delivery helps you keep track of your packages on your Android Wear watch. Delivery currently supports: UPS, FedEx, USPS, and DHL. If you know any free tracking API, please let me know. Thanks!


CREDIT: Thank Boxoh for providing the new package tracking API: http://www.boxoh.com/api/docs/
comments: I tried this because it has an app for the phone and a smart watch. I can't get any delivery information on either.
Needs more delivery services Looks like good app, but doesn't work with SF Express, so can't track my order from Aliexpress.
recentChanges: Regular SDK tools and dependency libs update.
